content.text: 1 1/2 pounds fresh tuna steaks, 1 inch thick
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 1/2 pounds fresh tuna steaks, 1 inch thick" )

content.text: 0) Generously coat tuna with Cajun seasoning.
1) Heat oil and butter in a large skillet over high heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "oil"@8:11 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "butter"@16:22 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a large skillet"@26:41 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-1-0 "high heat"@47:56 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) When oil is nearly smoking, place steaks in pan.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "place"@31:36 / AC
		:ppt ( "steaks"@37:43 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-2-0 "pan"@47:50 / TOOL )
		:duration ( cond-2-0 "When oil is nearly smoking"@3:29 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Cook on one side for 3 to 4 minutes, or until blackened.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Cook"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( "one side"@11:19 / OTHER )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "3 to 4 minutes"@24:38 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until blackened"@43:58 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Turn steaks, and cook for 3 to 4 minutes, or to desired doneness.
